column9: 2015 at the spring creek health care center in fort collins
column14: to gene & eva weakley. geneva graduated from brush high school in 1983
column16: and her ba degree from the university of northern colorado in 1987. she worked
column18: at the east morgan county library in brush and the fort morgan library. prior to ill health forcing her to quit her job at edwards market where she worked in the deli. geneva enjoyed oil painting art. geneva was survived by several cousins. a graveside service will be held tuesday
